2.0.1 / 2014-08-10
==================

  * deps: on-headers@~1.0.0

2.0.0 / 2014-05-31
==================

  * add `digits` argument
  * do not override existing `X-Response-Time` header
  * timer not subject to clock drift
  * timer resolution down to nanoseconds
  * use `on-headers` module

1.0.0 / 2014-02-08
==================

  * Genesis from `connect`
